item.dc:creator: @0.o 0.o
item.description:
@0.o wrote:

so if it is hp/10 why do i have an npc with 700 hp not hiting 70’s (not that i want it to) or is it most likely diferent on my server.

Read full topic
item.source: *answered thanks to ownage plz and infomaniac*

item.title: *answered thanks to ownage plz and infomaniac*
item.dc:creator: @InfoManiac InfoManiac
item.description:
@InfoManiac wrote:

Yes find this

	newNPC.MaxHit = (int)Math.floor((HP / 10));

That the Max hit… The NPCs HP divided by 10 for a certain NPC to hit a different amount do this

	if (npcType == XXX) {
	newNPC.MaxHit = (int)Math.floor((HP / XX));
	}

Read full topic
item.source: *answered thanks to ownage plz and infomaniac*

item.title: *answered thanks to ownage plz and infomaniac*
item.dc:creator: @InfoManiac InfoManiac
item.description:
@InfoManiac wrote:

Dude…

Find

					npcs[i].DeadApply = true;

And look for

					npcs[i].actionTimer = 60;

Change it to w\e

Read full topic
item.source: *answered thanks to ownage plz and infomaniac*

item.title: *answered thanks to ownage plz and infomaniac*
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

What you should do is look through the file that has to do with the thing you’re trying to change. Like npchandler.java. Here’s a bit of code I found.

[code]if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].DeadApply == true && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false && npcs[i] != null) {
MonsterDropItem(i);
npcs[i].NeedRespawn = true;
npcs[i].actionTimer = 60;
npcs[i].absX = npcs[i].makeX;
npcs[i].absY = npcs[i].makeY;
npcs[i].animNumber = 0x328;
npcs[i].HP = npcs[i].MaxHP;
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true;

				} else if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == true) {
					for (int j = 1; j < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; j++) {
						if (server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
							server.playerHandler.players[j].RebuildNPCList = true;
						}
					}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: *answered thanks to ownage plz and infomaniac*
